sentence.name: Sentence Window RAG
sentence.description: Retrieves a single sentence and provides context of surrounding sentences to the LLM.

parent.name: Parent Document RAG
parent.description: Retrieves smaller chunks but provides the full parent document to the LLM.

merging.name: Auto-merging RAG
merging.description: Retrieves multiple chunks and recursively merges them into a larger, more coherent context.
